topic.title: Where to start ?
topic.body: What unix toys i can use to play around and snoop for info, without causing any damage to myself and others, not looking for tuts about how to hack someone at all ? Any pointers into what i should look for and where to get info ( seems there is a book about google search magic around ) ? A novice python dabbler here, be gentle.

1_1L6AzNZhaGYwQcDWNffD1najBfyvzeKhsG.body:
> [joczo11](#comment_5_1HVJvkzPdXDEtsjBSzFLyx6KsG8Tg2nnr5): When I was a beginner,I used to "hack" routers.Just get an ip scanner (I prefer Angry IP Scanner),and start scanning around random IP's.For example your IP is 89.223.223.100,than scan the range from 89.223.223.1 to 89.223.223.254.There's a good chance that you will find something interesting - a router,a web camera,etc.If you need some IP addresses to start from,here's the log of my site:  http://users.atw.hu/joczo/adatok.htmI have found so much things in those addresses :D

I opted for nmap and fooling around with aircrack-ng. Thats for now haha.
